name: Electromecánica R.I.
address: Bahía Blanca Industrial Park, Bahía Blanca, Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Bahía Blanca-based company with national reach, specialized in the construction of overhead and underground power lines (low and medium voltage), public and sports lighting works, manufacturing of metal poles, electrical material distribution, and crane and equipment rental.

name: Fenestra S.A.
address: Bahía Blanca Industrial Park, Bahía Blanca, Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Company exclusively focused on the official distribution of glass, aluminum profiles, and hardware for window and curtain wall manufacturing. Main local representative of leading brands like VASA and ALCEMAR.

name: Grupo BBI S.A.
address: Bahía Blanca Industrial Park, Bahía Blanca, Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Official agency of Linde PLC Group, engaged in the sale and distribution of industrial and medical gases, welding equipment, and supplies.

name: Profertil S.A.
address: Road to Puerto Galván, no number, Bahía Blanca, Argentina
description: A leading fertilizer production company supporting sustainable agriculture throughout Argentina.

name: HCI S.A.
description: Company with 20 years of experience in industrial maintenance and assembly services for petrochemical plants, power generation, refineries, and continuous process industries. Specializes in mechanical repair and furnace assembly.

name: Unipar Indupa
address: Carrindanga Road, Km 7, Bahía Blanca, Argentina
description: A major chemical industry player in South America, producing chlorine, caustic soda, and PVC.

name: Orlando Lonas S.A.
address: Av. Colón 2755, Bahía Blanca, Buenos Aires, Argentina
description: Company specialized in manufacturing tarpaulins and plastic fabrics. Offers custom designs and liner production for liquid storage. Open to the public from Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
